pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the Vice President of United States Mike Pence | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Vice President Mike Pence of the United States on the margins of the Summit of the Americas in Lima, Peru.

The Prime Minister and the Vice President welcomed the progress made in the ongoing negotiations of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA). They also discussed their shared interests with respect to steel and aluminum.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Vice President Pence discussed the situation in Syria, and exchanged views on the ongoing crisis in Venezuela.
